title: SoC THEATRE 336-0-20 Playwriting II Genres

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Playwriting II: "I Voted" - Writing plays about the American Democratic Process

In this course we will carefully follow the 2016 election, reading plays, books, and current events about politics, politicians, and past elections. Ultimately students will craft plays that respond to politicians, campaign promises, voting, and the role of the playwright in the middle of democracy at work.

subject: THEATRE
